Class Animation3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • rajawali.renderer.AFrameTask
      • rajawali.animation.Animation3D
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ColorAnimation3D, EllipticalOrbitAnimation3D, RotateAnimation3D, RotateAroundAnimation3D, ScaleAnimation3D, SlerpAnimation3D, TranslateAnimation3D

extends AFrameTask

        Determine if an animation is currently playing.

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Pause an animation. Use {play() to continue.

      • play

        public void play()
        Start an animation for the first time or continue from a paused state. Use {pause() to halt an animation. Throws RuntimeException if no ATransformable3D object has been set.

      • registerListener

        public boolean registerListener(IAnimation3DListener animationListener)
        Register a listener for animations. Use unregisterListener(IAnimation3DListener) to remove a listener.
        Parameters:
        animationListener -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - Thrown when called while animation isPlaying() is true

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Stop the animation and set the elapsed time to zero.

      • setDelay

        public void setDelay(double delay)
        Set the delay of the animation in delta time. This is not treated as part of the duration.
        Parameters:
        duration -

      • setDelay

        public void setDelay(long delay)
        Set the delay of the animation in milliseconds. This is not treated as part of the duration.
        Parameters:
        duration -

      • setDuration

        public void setDuration(double duration)
        Set the duration of the animation in delta time. This is counted separate of the delay if any.
        Parameters:
        duration -

      • setDuration

        public void setDuration(long duration)
        Set the duration of the animation in milliseconds. This is counted separate of the delay if any.
        Parameters:
        duration -

      • setInterpolator

        public void setInterpolator(Interpolator interpolator)
        Set the Interpolator to use for the animation.
        Parameters:
        interpolator - Default is LinearInterpolator

      • setRepeatCount

        public void setRepeatCount(int repeatCount)
        Set the number of times to repeat the animation. Repeat count will be ignored for Animation3D.RepeatMode.NONE, Animation3D.RepeatMode.INFINITE, and Animation3D.RepeatMode.REVERSE_INFINITE. When using Animation3D.RepeatMode.REVERSE each direction change will be counted against the repeat count.
        Parameters:
        repeatCount -

      • setRepeatMode

        public void setRepeatMode(Animation3D.RepeatMode repeatMode)
        Set the repeat mode of the animation using Animation3D.RepeatMode.
        Parameters:
        repeatMode -

      • setStartTime

        public void setStartTime(double startTime)
        Set the start time in delta time, that is less than the duration, which to start the animation. Setting a time outside the animation duration will throw a RuntimeException.
        Parameters:
        time -

      • setStartTime

        public void setStartTime(long startTime)
        Set the start time in milliseconds, that is less than the duration, which to start the animation. Setting a time outside the animation duration will throw a RuntimeException.
        Parameters:
        time -

      • setTransformable3D

        public void setTransformable3D(ATransformable3D transformable3D)
        Set the transformable object to be manipulated by the animation.
        Parameters:
        transformable3D -

      • unregisterListener

        public boolean unregisterListener(IAnimation3DListener animationListener)
        Unregister a given listener. Use registerListener(IAnimation3DListener) to add a listener. Returns true on success.
        Parameters:
        animationListener -
        Returns:
        Boolean
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - Thrown when called while animation isPlaying() is true

      • update

        public void update(double deltaTime)
        Calculate the elapsed time and interpolated time of the animation. Also responsible for firing animation events.
        Parameters:
        deltaTime -

      • applyTransformation

        protected abstract void applyTransformation()
        Perform object manipulation here. Use the mInterpolatedTime, a value determined by the setInterpolator(Interpolator), to manipulate objects.
